original_text: Which was with the deputy of the country, Sergius Paulus, a prudent man; who called for Barnabas and Saul, and desired to hear the word of God.
korean_text: 그가 총독 서기오 바울과 함께 있으니 서기오 바울은 지혜 있는 사람이라 바나바와 사울을 불러 하나님의 말씀을 듣고자 하더라

sentences.original_text: Which was with the deputy of the country
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그 지역의 총독과 함께 있었는데

sentences.original_text: who called for Barnabas and Saul
and desired to hear the word of God
